text.div:
This value set contains 7 concepts

Expansion based on SNOMED CT International edition 31-Jul 2021

All codes in this table are from the system http://snomed.info/sct

CodeDisplayDefinition
424122007Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status finding (finding)
422512005Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status - grade 1 (finding)
